body.p: DocBook Targetset documents are used to resolve cross references with the DocBook olink.
DocBook Targetset document typeassociation rulesA file is considered to be a Targetset when the root name is targetset.
DocBook Targetset document typeschemaThis type of documents uses a DTD and schema located in [OXYGEN_DIR]/frameworks/docbook/xsl/common/targetdatabase.dtd.

section.title: Document Templates
section.p: The default template for DocBook Targetset documents is located in the [OXYGEN_DIR]/frameworks/docbook/templates/Targetset folder.
The following DocBook Targetset template is available when creating new documents from templates:

ul.li: Docbook Targetset - Map - New Targetset map.
